lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John M. The Officers, Trustees and Members of the Hollywood Golf Club note with sorrow the passing of their longtime friend and member, Mr. John M. Angelo. Former Board of Trustees Member, Creator and Chairperson of the Scholarship Committee, Club Historian/Chairperson of the Historical Committee and Golf Enthusiast. We offer our heartfelt condolences to his family. James Aaron, President Kevin Lang, Secretary 1/3
